.. _`Troubleshooting`:

Troubleshooting
===============
This section describes some common issues that can arise and possible solutions.

Issue #1
--------
<Description>
.gitignore not ingoring the right file 

<Solution>
Removing it from the git cache with 'git rm --cached <filename>'

Issue #2
--------
<Description>
Outdated requirements.txt Causing Problems

<Solution>
Manually doing a pip install <dependancy-name> for Each Missing Dependancy

Issue #3
--------
<Description>
Comparing Two SQLAlchemy Entities with '==' will always Return False

<Solution>
Compare Their Table Fields Instead Since Comparing The Entries will Really Compare Their RAM Locations
